data.name: New Meaning
data.detailed_description:
Join me, we are going to help Luke find happiness!

We can help him! We can save him!

His life is in our hands! How exciting ^_^

Will you use your 3 days wisely, or succumb to the pressure of being a conscious being?

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

If you'd like to support my future development: https://www.patreon.com/BraveLobster
data.about_the_game:
Join me, we are going to help Luke find happiness!

We can help him! We can save him!

His life is in our hands! How exciting ^_^

This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

If you'd like to support my future development: https://www.patreon.com/BraveLobster
data.short_description: In New Meaning you play as Luke Wilson, or do you? Luke is a struggling teenager trying to shed some light upon a dark lonely world, will you help him or will you aid his departure into depression? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: New Meaning alludes to suicide and other mental health issues that may be overwhelming for some.
